price: ߏ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߕߊ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߡߊ߲߬ߛߊ߬ߦߊ ߘߌ߫ ، ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߴߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߢߣߊ߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
